channel.title: DB on Tech Elixir
channel.description: Recent content in DB on Tech Elixir

item.title: What's up with DuckDBðŸ¦†
item.description: I was exploring the vector database world after my day job when I came across ChromaDB which recently raised a seed funding of 20 mils ðŸ’¸. Digging deep into chroma led me to DuckDB as these mfs at Chroma are selling a wrapper on an already matured OLAP DB (DuckDB) with hnswlib. Just for context, hnswlib is a C++/Python library for fast calculation of approximate nearest neighbors (ANN). I’ll take more about vector DBs some other day when I’ll hopefully use it in my side project.
